definition: a musical form consisting of a theme repeated a fifth above or a fourth below its first statement
details:
noun
- a musical form consisting of a theme repeated a fifth above or a fourth below its first statement
- a dreamlike state of altered consciousness that may last for hours or days
- dissociative disorder in which a person forgets who they are and leaves home to creates a new life
= example: dissociative disorder in which a person forgets who they are and leaves home to creates a new life
= synonyms: psychogenic fugue
